paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: prolonged action potential duration and increased sensitivity to early after depolarizations
individual_records.evidence_sentence: They found that LQT2–iPSC-CM exhibited prolonged APD and increased sensitivity to early after depolarizations (EADs) with isoprenaline treatment.

functional_data.summary: The variant leads to prolonged action potential duration and increased susceptibility to arrhythmias.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with the disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the functional impact of the KCNH2 variant in patient-derived iPSC-CMs.
key_quotes: LQT2–iPSC-CM exhibited prolonged APD and increased sensitivity to early after depolarizations (EADs) with isoprenaline treatment.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the KCNH2 variant was successfully extracted.
